task.name: plotprofilemap
task.description: The plotprofilemap makes spectral profile map from specified image. The task accepts both CASA image and FITS cube as an input.

param.name: imagename
param.description: Input image name (CASA image or FITS)

task.example:
The plotprofilemap makes spectral profile map from specified image. The task accepts both CASA image and FITS cube as an input.
It is necessary to specify existing CASA image or FITS cube as an imagename. Otherwise, the task will fail. If figfile is specified, profile map is saved as an PNG image. Please set overwrite to False if you don't want to overwrite existing file.
Keyword arguments: imagename -- input image name (CASA image or FITS cube) figfile -- output PNG image name. No output if figfile is empty default: '' (no output) overwrite -- overwrite existing output file default: False
